file_info.description: Layout B features split hero (left/right), products with sidebar, full-width about section, 3-column testimonials, and 2-column contact layout

unique_features: Split hero with equal or asymmetric columns

features: Image can be left or right

products.grid: 4 items per row on desktop, responsive on mobile

features: May include images in grid below text
Contact details + map in other column

responsive_behavior.mobile: All sections stack vertically, sidebar moves to top or becomes accordion
responsive_behavior.tablet: Hero stays split, products become 2-column, testimonials 2-column
responsive_behavior.desktop: Full layout with sidebar, 4-column products, 3-column testimonials
